  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="73924" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="73924" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.92</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="180">180</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="35"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Sports Car Club</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. <b>Sports Car Club</b> was launched in 2022. Top notes are Pine and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Cypress and Eucalyptus; base notes are Ambroxan, Patchouli and Musk. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Deutsch</a>,  <a <br />

<br />
Unfortunately, it is a limited edition, so not easy to find, also a bit pricey to me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1975656"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1975656#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1941447" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; If it could be a bit less sweet, it would be better and more masculine. But overall, the scent is pleasant. 8.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1941447"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1941447#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1908518" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1908518" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Royal12"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1499856"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1499856.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Royal12" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1908518ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1908518" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);      <br />
     <br />
9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1908518"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1908518#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1881282" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1764595">WeezyPipes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-18">06/18/23 21:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is one of the better performing frags from this house (it survived three scrubbings on my arm) and it smells pretty good. I'm not a fan of the name and presentation. I didn't pick up much eucalyptus at all but it does manage to stay a bit fresh, I think it's wearable any time year round.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1859522"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1859522#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1857798" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Dr. Lewis Dodgson from Jurassic World Dominion wears this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1857798"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1857798#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1776738" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1776738" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SmellSharpe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1447620"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1447620.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="SmellSharpe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-L-Homme-39029.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39029.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada L'Homme"title="Prada L'Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1776738ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1776738" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1447620">SmellSharpe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-06">03/06/23 16:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I finally broke down and bought a bottle as it has been discontinued and stock is basically gone. <br />
<br />
Sports Car Club is so different than anything else Penhaligons has made. In fact, it is totally different than any other fragrance I have tried.<br />
<br />
Penhaligons fragrances are stupidly expensive, but I just love this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1776738"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1776738#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1740482" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1740482" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jrelkin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369494"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1369494.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jrelkin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Houbigant/Duc-de-Vervins-L-Extreme-26780.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.26780.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Duc de Vervins L'Extreme"title="Duc de Vervins L'Extreme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1740482ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1740482" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369494">jrelkin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-22">01/22/23 07:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This stuff is GREAT. I was lured in by the 'sports car' name and stayed because it smells better than most anything I've had pass across my nose; the blend of notes in this all work together to make a well-balanced fragrance that is sweet without being sickly sweet and woody without feeling like I'm sitting in a pine forest. Most of all, it smells sophisticated which is something to be considered given its price point. <br />
<br />
10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1740482"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1740482#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1716922" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1716922" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nixie9"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1396123"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1396123.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nixie9" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/The-Matcha-26-69731.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69731.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Matcha 26"title="The Matcha 26"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1716922ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1716922" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1396123">Nixie9</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-25">12/25/22 05:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought this for my hubby and we both really like it! It reminds me of a reworked, more masculine Juniper Sling, in that its very fresh and aromatic. Its definitely pine forward, but theres a warmth and sweetness from the patchouli thats quite appealing. The eucalyptus and camphor provides an almost minty undercurrent thats quite unusual and pleasantit opens my nose in a cooling way that contrasts pleasantly with the patch, pine and pepper warmth. Nicely balanced! The dry down is warm pine and lasts 8+ hours. Moderate sillage. I understand why some might be put off by the Ambrox noteit could lend a generic quality; however, its strongest on first application and then melds with the other notes. I think it serves as a bridge between the warm and cool notes. And the the eucalyptus/camphor may hint at muscle rub, but to be honest, its not strong enough to really warrant that comparison to my nose. Without it, that bracing, clear headed feeling would be gone. There are hints or nods to other perfumes, but this really is unique to me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1716922"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1716922#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1704411" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1704411" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MitHsur"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1190697"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="MitHsur" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1704411ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1704411" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1190697">MitHsur</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-07">12/07/22 18:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yikes. I tested today and smh what is Penhaligon's thinking? It feels like its from a completely other brand. I've worn their fragrances for years and normally love the new releases (although the animal heads started to blend together for me...) I must have smelled this from a dozen other houses in the past few years.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1704411"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1704411#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1689922" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1689922" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tandem_4x4"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/713693"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.713693.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tandem_4x4" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rouge-Bunny-Rouge/Incognito-29098.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.29098.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Incognito"title="Incognito"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1689922ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1689922" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/713693">tandem_4x4</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-16">11/16/22 15:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bottle design is Ska style</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1689922"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1689922#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1659022" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1659022" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SmellMyCheese"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1171159"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1171159.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SmellMyCheese" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1659022ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1659022" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1171159">SmellMyCheese</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-04">10/04/22 15:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet and slightly grassy and peppery cypress, and a fresh mild menthol background on a clean wood base. Almost like a pine and vetiver clash.<br />
Very nice, and it lasts a decent while I guess with the synthetics added.<br />
<br />
I really like it, but I already have fragrances in this style already so given the high-ish price I am skipping. If it was maybe 1/2 to 2/3 what it goes for retail I would pick it up.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1659022"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1659022#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1651863" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1651863" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="youreyes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/10146"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.10146.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="youreyes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Rush-686.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.686.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gucci Rush"title="Gucci Rush"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1651863ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1651863" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/10146">youreyes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-24">09/24/22 07:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like a fresh, mentholated vetiver, even though vetiver is not listed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1651863"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1651863#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1628997" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1628997" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CodyHowl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/417752"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.417752.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CodyHowl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1628997ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1628997" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/417752">CodyHowl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-22">08/22/22 10:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A sweet, almost fruity fougere. This is definitely one of Penhaligons most youthful fragrances, and yet, I cant imagine a young person wanting to wear this.<br />
<br />
As others have stated, the notes pyramid is way off. The pine is much more reminiscent of a pine tree air freshener that dangles from a rear view mirror, and the eucalyptus seriously smells like Bengay or a muscle rub. But its sweet, overwhelmingly sweet, and it shouldnt be.<br />
<br />
Given the name, I was expecting something classically masculine and evocative; maybe a fir-and-leather old man scent, or something like Floris 1962, or original Polo. I wouldve been happy with any of those, I love classy old man fragrances. This is not that.<br />
<br />
Pine air freshener, Juicy Fruit gum, and a camphorous muscle cream. Dries down into a very middle-of-the-road amber. Im unimpressed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1628997"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1628997#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1621542" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1621542" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mizur"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1503389"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1503389.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mizur" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/M-Micallef/Sensual-40563.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40563.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sensual"title="Sensual"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1621542ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1621542" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1503389">mizur</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-11">08/11/22 11:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Spicy sweet freshness!!<br />
<br />
It starts a bit like old drugstore camphore candies, (yes Im that old), sweet but medicinal, still very likable but the magic begins on the drydown its all about a spicy sweetness from the pink pepper, the ambroxan and the musk, which together with the eucalyptus create a recipe for perfection. <br />
<br />
This perfume is not so sweet as to make it only a cold day scent, and also not so fresh as to make it only a sporty fragrance, in reality Sports Car Club is a very well balanced juice ideal to be used preferably daytime, in any season and in any weather.<br />
<br />
I really liked it very much!!<br />
<br />
Unfortunately it has a big drawback as with almost all spicy fresh scents, projection is very limited, almost intimate, and longevity is non existent after just two hours it couldnt be detected on my skin, it requieres constant reapplying in order to last throughout the day.<br />
<br />
Penhaligons did an amazing job on the scent, but a terrible one on performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1621542"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1621542#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1616902" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1616902" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mr.Verbena"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1433577"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1433577.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mr.Verbena" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1616902ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1616902" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1433577">Mr.Verbena</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-04">08/04/22 12:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really interesting Penhaligon's scent, not for everyone, and poorly branded. Very aftershavey, but also SUPER aldehyde-y, which makes it feel sweet, but in a sticky, transparent, sweaty, summery kind of way. This is a very gender-neutral, young fragrance IMO... 22 year old NB summer in LA, dangly earring vibes, not 42 year old man with a kiss of grey in his mustache whizzing by in a vintage car. Like I get that that doesn't exist within the Penhaligon's universe of characters, but still. Very tropical fruit, eucalyptus, and pachouli. I like it for layering with something more woody or spicy that needs a little lightness, or maybe feels a but too mature for the situation.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1616902"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1616902#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1612118" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1612118" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ashcroft87"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/614778"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.614778.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ashcroft87" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1612118ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1612118" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/614778">Ashcroft87</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-28">07/28/22 05:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It opens up to my nose with a Patchouli Pineapple combo for the morphing into a fresh-sweet-balsamic experience with the eucalyptus and fir-balsam. You feel the diffusion of the Ambroxan (more like Ambrofix to me) which helps to sustain the freshness throughout the hours.<br />
<br />
Tried on a paper-strip only and for some reason there is an awkward accord to my nose that feels like tuna chunk. Must be just me :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1612118"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1612118#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1610909" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1610909" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Margot T"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1146646"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1146646.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Margot T" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1610909ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1610909" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1146646">Margot T</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-26">07/26/22 10:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bleh.<br />
<br />
I had high hopes for this one.<br />
I keep striking out with Penhaligons.<br />
<br />
Its a confusing fragrance.<br />
<br />
Im not really smelling much eucalyptus, pine or patchouli (which were the things I most wanted).<br />
<br />
What I am smelling is fig.<br />
<br />
Fig, which I do not care for.<br />
Fig, which makes this fragrance sweet.<br />
Fig, which is not listed as a note.<br />
<br />
Its a mild, masculine leaning, mens aftershave smell with the faintest woodiness and prominent fig.<br />
Would perform best as a summer fragrance as the heat and humidity make it stronger whereas inside in brisk air conditioning, it is almost undetectable.<br />
Almost like a bowl of grandmas potpourri with a dash of fig.<br />
<br />
Quite the bummer as I blind bought a bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1610909"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1610909#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1601063" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1601063" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BlueMoon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/601683"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BlueMoon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1601063ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1601063" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/601683">BlueMoon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-11">07/11/22 14:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A SOLID NEW PENHALIGON<br />
<br />
I had a difficult time wrapping my nose around what notes I was experiencing. Even now, after reading the notes - I still don't truly recognize any of them individually as I sniff my wrists. <br />
But this is not a negative. <br />
<br />
This is a fresh, day scent - male oriented, easy-to-wear (fine for office, etc).  It's not a must-have. But if I was given a bottle as a gift - I'd wear it.<br />
<br />
Far from ground breaking. And not nearly as interesting as Endymion. It's another easy-to-wear Penhaligon for men - which seems to be one of the strengths of this house. <br />
<br />
Definitely worth a sample!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1601063"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1601063#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1592840" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1592840" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Baccarat Racquets"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1476241"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1476241.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Baccarat Racquets" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Armaf/Club-de-Nuit-Sillage-64105.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64105.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Club de Nuit Sillage"title="Club de Nuit Sillage"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1592840ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1592840" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1476241">Baccarat Racquets</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-28">06/28/22 05:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the first Penhaligons fragrance I can say I have been severely disappointed in, I expected a vintage scent with that new car smell freshness. The base of the scent seems like it would lend itself to this type of profile, however the eucalyptus absolutely blows everything else away in it, I have been suffering with a stuffy nose, not anymore thanks to this, which I don't think is what a fragrance should be good for. This could have been great, but unfortunately seems to have taken a wrong turn somewhere and crashed horribly. As always though, the presentation is second to none.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1592840"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1592840#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1581055" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1572001" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Thanasis_87k"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1361577"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Thanasis_87k" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Viking-41698.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41698.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Viking"title="Viking"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1572001ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1572001" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1361577">Thanasis_87k</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-27">05/27/22 05:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Spring scent, masculine leaning. I could wear it for a day out and leisure. Inoffensive enough to wear it at the office. It reminds me of those fresh breath candies, pine and eucalyptus are prominent. It is rather intimate and of medium performance for an edp. I think for a price range below 80 one can find something similar or go straight for pino sylvestre. I might give it a second try for a new review since I only got a sample.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1572001"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1572001#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1570855" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; But why?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1567905"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1567905#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1567263" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1567263" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Birdy716"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1382324"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1382324.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Birdy716" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1567263ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1567263" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1382324">Birdy716</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-19">05/19/22 14:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Don't waste your money, it smells great but like a lot of the offerings from penhaligons it immediately turns into a skin scent before vanishing altogether, it has no silliage at all. What a shame</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1567263"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1567263#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1556531" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1556531" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ts01"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1385228"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ts01" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1556531ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1556531" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1385228">ts01</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-03">05/03/22 20:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I usually avoid perfumes where, if someone asked me what I was wearing, I would be embarrassed to say the name (I love Viking, but the name is about at my limit). <br />
<br />
If it turns out that "sports car club" smells really good, I think I'd just have to pray nobody ever asks me what it is.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1556531"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1556531#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                    </div>

</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1857798" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1857798" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="J_TheWombKilla"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1364493"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1364493.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="J_TheWombKilla" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/John-Varvatos/JV-x-NJ-Crimson-51718.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51718.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="JV x NJ Crimson "title="JV x NJ Crimson "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1857798ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1857798" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1364493">J_TheWombKilla</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-16">06/16/23 10:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A genetically homogeneous forest, too pristine to be naturally occurring.<br />
<br />
Dr. Lewis Dodgson from Jurassic World Dominion wears this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1857798"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1857798#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1716922" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1716922" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nixie9"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1396123"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1396123.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nixie9" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/The-Matcha-26-69731.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69731.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Matcha 26"title="The Matcha 26"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1716922ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1716922" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1396123">Nixie9</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-25">12/25/22 05:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought this for my hubby and we both really like it! It reminds me of a reworked, more masculine Juniper Sling, in that its very fresh and aromatic. Its definitely pine forward, but theres a warmth and sweetness from the patchouli thats quite appealing. The eucalyptus and camphor provides an almost minty undercurrent thats quite unusual and pleasantit opens my nose in a cooling way that contrasts pleasantly with the patch, pine and pepper warmth. Nicely balanced! The dry down is warm pine and lasts 8+ hours. Moderate sillage. I understand why some might be put off by the Ambrox noteit could lend a generic quality; however, its strongest on first application and then melds with the other notes. I think it serves as a bridge between the warm and cool notes. And the the eucalyptus/camphor may hint at muscle rub, but to be honest, its not strong enough to really warrant that comparison to my nose. Without it, that bracing, clear headed feeling would be gone. There are hints or nods to other perfumes, but this really is unique to me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1716922"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1716922#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1740482" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1740482" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jrelkin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369494"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1369494.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jrelkin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Houbigant/Duc-de-Vervins-L-Extreme-26780.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.26780.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Duc de Vervins L'Extreme"title="Duc de Vervins L'Extreme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1740482ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1740482" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369494">jrelkin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-22">01/22/23 07:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This stuff is GREAT. I was lured in by the 'sports car' name and stayed because it smells better than most anything I've had pass across my nose; the blend of notes in this all work together to make a well-balanced fragrance that is sweet without being sickly sweet and woody without feeling like I'm sitting in a pine forest. Most of all, it smells sophisticated which is something to be considered given its price point. <br />
<br />
10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1740482"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1740482#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1859522" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I'm not a fan of the name and presentation. I didn't pick up much eucalyptus at all but it does manage to stay a bit fresh, I think it's wearable any time year round.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1859522"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1859522#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1975656" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;     <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1610909" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1610909" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Margot T"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1146646"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1146646.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Margot T" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1610909ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1610909" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1146646">Margot T</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-26">07/26/22 10:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bleh.<br />
<br />
I had high hopes for this one.<br />
I keep striking out with Penhaligons.<br />
<br />
Its a confusing fragrance.<br />
<br />
Im not really smelling much eucalyptus, pine or patchouli (which were the things I most wanted).<br />
<br />
What I am smelling is fig.<br />
<br />
Fig, which I do not care for.<br />
Fig, which makes this fragrance sweet.<br />
Fig, which is not listed as a note.<br />
<br />
Its a mild, masculine leaning, mens aftershave smell with the faintest woodiness and prominent fig.<br />
Would perform best as a summer fragrance as the heat and humidity make it stronger whereas inside in brisk air conditioning, it is almost undetectable.<br />
Almost like a bowl of grandmas potpourri with a dash of fig.<br />
<br />
Quite the bummer as I blind bought a bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1610909"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1610909#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1567263" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1567263" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Birdy716"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1382324"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1382324.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Birdy716" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1567263ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1567263" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1382324">Birdy716</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-19">05/19/22 14:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Don't waste your money, it smells great but like a lot of the offerings from penhaligons it immediately turns into a skin scent before vanishing altogether, it has no silliage at all. What a shame</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="73924"comment_id="1567263"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sports-Car-Club-73924.html?ccid=1567263#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="73924" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="search-reviews"><search-perfume-reviews :perfume_id="73924":random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]"></search-perfume-reviews></div></div><foundation-tabs></foundation-tabs></reviews-wrapper></div><perfume-shortcut-menu :perfume_id="73924" when-hidden="#toptop"></perfume-shortcut-menu><initialize-status-data></initialize-status-data><div class="cell small-12"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_footer -->

    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFFe5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
